channel.title: Ngc7380 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights
channel.description: Recent content in Ngc7380 on Suburban Backyard Astro Sights

item.title: The Wizard Nebula
item.description: The Wizard Nebula is a cosmic cloud surrounding open star cluster NGC 7380. Over the years it has earned its sorcerous nickname because of its similarity in appearance to a medieval magician in a pointed hat. (It does take a little imagination!)
